# el-modal



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property          | Attribute           | Description                  | Type                                     | Default |
| ----------------- | ------------------- | ---------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ------- |
| `closable`        | `closable`          | Closable (show close button) | `boolean`                                | `true`  |
| `closeOnBackdrop` | `close-on-backdrop` | Close on backdrop click      | `boolean`                                | `true`  |
| `open`            | `open`              | Open state                   | `boolean`                                | `false` |
| `persistent`      | `persistent`        | Persistent (prevent closing) | `boolean`                                | `false` |
| `size`            | `size`              | Size                         | `"full" \| "lg" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xl"` | `'md'`  |


## Events

| Event     | Description | Type                |
| --------- | ----------- | ------------------- |
| `elClose` |             | `CustomEvent<void>` |
